messages.author: Ninroot
messages.content: Hello, what do you want to do ?

responses.content: Tell me more about the game.

messages.author: Ninroot
messages.content: We tell you a story, you do choice to change how things going. Sometime you can have few second to respond

messages.author: Ninroot
messages.content: DoYouCopy project is an open source program inspired buy FireWatch.

messages.author: Ninroot
messages.content: You can create your own stories and share them over the internet. You can also participate to make the game engine better.

messages.author: Ninroot
messages.content: On upon a time there was a ring...

responses.content: Take a fly until Mordor and destroy the freaking ring ! (the end)

messages.author: Ninroot
messages.content: Very well you finished the story
